elusive.translation[0].definitions[0].de: an elusive person or animal is difficult to find or not often seen
elusive.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She managed to get an interview with that elusive man.
elusive.translation[0].definitions[1].de: an elusive result is difficult to achieve
elusive.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: She enjoys a firm reputation in this country but wider international success has been elusive.
elusive.translation[0].definitions[2].de: an elusive idea or quality is difficult to describe or understand
elusive.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: For me, the poem has an elusive quality.
